home.heroTagline: Professor of Philosophy · University of Buenos Aires
home.heroTitle: Prof. Juan Pablo Viola treats philosophy as a public practice.
home.heroBody: Chair of Phenomenology and Ethics at UBA, Juan Pablo works with universities and civic institutions to translate continental philosophy into actionable teaching, research, and public dialogue.

home.highlightsBody: Programs weaving phenomenology, ethics, and Latin American public life.

highlights.title: Phenomenology studio
highlights.body: Guides 180+ students each term through textual analysis, field diaries, and reflective practice.

highlights.title: Ethics of care & tech
highlights.body: Coordinates funded studies on AI, memory, and social infrastructure with interdisciplinary teams.

highlights.title: Community lecture circuit
highlights.body: Partners with cultural centers to open philosophy dialogues beyond campus walls.

home.cvBody: Doctoral research in contemporary philosophy, visiting fellowships in Europe, and two decades of classroom leadership.
